clientSide.stubs

Class KitchenStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.KitchenStub

  • public class KitchenStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the kitchen stub It instantiates a remote reference to the kitchen stub. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String serverHostName
      Name of the platform where is located the kitchen server.
      private int serverPortNumb
      Port number for listening to service requests.
